class shamanapp.helpers.mongo_accessor.MongoAccessor(host, db, collection, time_to_reconnect, n_retries=5, update_retry_wait=3, maxPoolSize=128, waitQueueMultiple=5)¶

Bases: object

update(id_doc, document, check_keys=False)¶
shamanapp.helpers.mongo_accessor.dict_roll(document, field_to_roll='extra', first_call=True, ignore_set=None)¶

This method takes document ready for mongo upsert and rolls out inner documets with ‘.’ for correct mongo merge :param document: document dict :param field_to_roll: field to roll_out :param ignore_set: set of fields which would never be rolled out :return: changed inplace document
